name: Westrunner
description: Run 'n' gun your way through the Wild West! You play as the Sheriff of a small town in the early nineteenth century. Your mission is simple... make your way through the dangerous streets of the town while taking out the ne'er do wells. With your surprising parkour skills and trusty six shooter by your side, you are well equipped to defend your town. However, it is not as easy as it may seem...
